title: I want Refund
body:
I bought 2000rp because of my mistake. 
I wanted to buy 1000rp with $10 but I clicked $20.
So I pressed cancle button and bought 1000rp.
After a game, I saw that I have 2000rp and when I checked my card's account, $20 was payed.
I hope I can get refund. Thank you

replies.body: Hit up our billing team in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). They'll be able to see all of your purchase history and should be able to get that reversed as long as the RP hasn't been used yet.
